item.description:
The movie time is 7:00 so let's meet in the lobby by 6:45.

Runtime:1 hr. 41 min.
R: some language and sexual material

Bill Maher travels around the globe interviewing people about God and religion. Known for his astute analytical skills, irreverent wit and commitment to never pulling a punch, Maher brings his characteristic honesty to an unusual spiritual journey.


Comedian Bill Maher examines the presence of religion in many of the big news stories of recent years, from Muslim riots over cartoons to the Ten Commandments in front of courthouses, a born-again Christian in the White House and Scientology in the birthing room.

Reviews:

"The humor [Maher] creates at their expense proves nothing except that dealing from a stacked deck benefits no one but the dealer. "
Los Angeles Times

- Kenneth Turan
"...those with a taste for irreverent humor and clear-eyed analysis will find it funny, enlightening and disturbing."
USA Today

- Claudia Puig
"Pic gets in satirical digs at all faiths -- and yields some of its biggest laughs..."
Variety

- Robert Koehler
